title: Show of Force
description: Using your advice, a public show of force is performed in an attempt to curtail criminal activity or subversive activity in the kingdom. Attempt a basic Warfare check to determine how effective the Show of Force is.

criticalSuccess.msg: The kingdom’s criminals are cowed by the show of force. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="crime" data-mode="lose" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="2">Lose 2 Crime</button> and reduce one other Ruin of your choice by 1.

success.msg: The kingdom’s criminals take note of the show of force. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="crime" data-mode="lose" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Lose 1 Crime</button>

failure.msg: The show of force fails to impress criminals but unsettles the rest of the citizens. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Unrest</button>.

criticalFailure.msg: The criminals are emboldened by the failed show of force. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1d4">Gain 1d4 Unrest</button> and <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="crime" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Crime</button>.
